Miami_Beach.Aria on the Bay: Aria on the Bay is a high-rise condominium under construction in the Omni/Edgewater neighborhood at 1770 North Bayshore Drive, Miami, Florida, U.S.A. overlooking Margaret Pace Park and Biscayne Bay in Miami's Arts & Entertainment District, Aria on the Bay location is conveniently located to Downtown Miami, Design District, Wynwood, The Beaches and Brickell. It was approved at a height of 535 feet (163 m) in 2015 after an initial notice of presumed hazard by the FAA, who recommended a height of 460 feet. The 52-story building will have over 648 units ranging from 813-2365 sq ft as well as commercial space.
